title: proposal: x/crypto/acme/autocert: enforce OCSP must staple
body:
Given we automatically staple OCSP responses, I think it makes sense to enforce OCSP must staple on all certificates. If not, I think it should at least be configurable.

It looks like a pretty simple change: https://github.com/hlandau/acme/commit/f19e7121cf52a25a2e6c35fbb4e040e08add1743
